Author: Mary Spio
Post Text: It was my distinct honor to keynote the 2023 Society of Cable Telecommunications Engineers (SCTE) 40th anniversary Expo. The reception was incredible. Thank you to everyone. I look forward to collaborating and innovating to move our connected world forwardüôèMeeting so many brilliant people and sharing the stage with industry icons and legends to discuss how to leverage the Metaverse (Web3) is definitely a new career highlight üí™¬†I shared expertise and insights with the cable telecommunications industry on why the Metaverse (web3) is too huge an opportunity to ignore and how CEEK offers a seamless bridge between the physical and virtual worlds, enabling businesses to unlock new revenue streams and reach global audiences in ways never before possible.CEEK‚Äôs robust infrastructure supported by 6 Awarded patents and a growing library of proprietary IPs enable users to easily consume, stream and monetize virtual experiences and goods. Some of the biggest brands in the world, including Berkshire Hathaway‚Äôs Richline, Meta, Microsoft and Apple partnered with CEEK; and how through our innovative technology, strategic partnerships and active community of over 7 Million ceekers, CEEK has positioned itself as a leading player in the rapidly growing Web3 metaverse revolution.#SCTE #CableExpo23 #Metaverse #10G #innovation #CEEK

Author: Mary Spio
Post Text: Many of you have reached out, curious about my transformation, so as we enter a new year and set resolutions, I want to take a moment to reflect on one I made amidst the challenges of the past few years. I hope it inspires and encourages those who may be struggling with the same issues to persevere.As entrepreneurs, business professionals and caring humans, it's easy to find ourselves focused on achieving success, consumed by our responsibilities, commitments and taking care of everyone else, inadvertently forgetting the most important person in the equation ‚Äì ourselves. We tirelessly pour our energy into our work, families, and communities, neglecting our own mental and physical health in the process.But here's the truth - we cannot give our best when we are running on empty. Just like the pre-flight safety advice, it‚Äôs crucial to put our oxygen mask on first, before we can effectively help others and contribute meaningfully to the world.I resolved to prioritize my wellbeing and the results have been incredible. It hasn't been easy; there‚Äôs been many setbacks, and the road ahead still carries uncertainties. Too often, we only see the glory without getting the full story - the sacrifices, hard work, tears shed, sweat, heartaches and constant fears of reverting to old habits that occur behind the scenes. That's precisely why I‚Äôm sharing both the low points and the highlights with you. If you can relate, it simply means you‚Äôre human :DAs we embark on a new year filled with resolutions and goals, whether it‚Äôs chasing your dreams, exercising more or anything else that helps you be your highest self; I invite you to join me in creating a community of people who celebrate and encourage personal well-being alongside our professional pursuits. Together, we can break free from the relentless cycle of neglect and build healthier and happier versions of ourselves.I'm certain there‚Äôll be challenges, but I‚Äôm filled with hope and excitement for what's to come, knowing that we‚Äôre building an amazing community to turn to for inspiration, resources, support, kind words, collective wisdom, and encouragement to fuel the determination needed to keep growing. Let‚Äôs embrace the lows and celebrate the highs together.Here's to a year filled with growth, joy, and infinite possibilities. Together, we can make this incredible journey worthwhile üéâ A heartfelt thank you to all of you for your continued belief, support, and encouragement. It‚Äôs been a source of inspiration fueling me on the toughest days. Let's make 2024 a year we're all proud of! #HappyNewYear #2024goals #PromisesKept

Author: Mary Spio
Post Text: The atmosphere in the movie theatre was electric as the credits rolled for the #BobMarley #OneLove movie. Applause filled the air, a testament to the captivating and extraordinary story we had just experienced. As the lights slowly came up, some audience members remained in their seats, deep in thought, reflecting on the powerful journey we had witnessed.This cinematic masterpiece truly showcased the profound legacy that #RitaMarley and Bob Marley have created. Their influence and impact on the world are unquestionable, and this film beautifully captured the essence of their remarkable journey.I've had the privilege of working with the Marleys over the years, which made the movie even more meaningful to me. Being able to witness firsthand the dedication and passion that fuels their music and message added an extra layer of appreciation.Here‚Äôs a clip from my interview with Stephen Marley, where he reflects on the profound influence his father had on his own musical career.¬†üëâüèΩ Checkout full interview here¬†https://lnkd.in/eangWMihThe One Love Bob Marley movie is an absolute must-see.

Author: Mary Spio
Post Text: Netflix's record-breaking NUMBER ONE #1 movie #Heartofahunter, with over 110 million views, was written and directed by the acclaimed South African filmmaker Mandla Dube. This standout success showcases the power of diversity and serves as a testament to the importance of embracing it.Today, over 70% of Netflix‚Äôs revenue comes from outside US and Canada. Last year over 73% of Global Streaming Subscriber Growth also came from the rest of the world. These revenues underscore the undeniable #FACT that  diversity and the global marketplace cannot be ignored.When we share our light, we live in a brighter world, and the possibilities expand for all. Author: Mary Spio
Post Text: One of the most valuable lessons we can glean from the story is the initial view that there was no hope for the Bob Marley band to be successful in the US. Island Records Founder #ChrisBlackwell,¬†the man who helped bring the world #BobMarley recalls his early days with the band. This illustrates the importance of persistence and unwavering belief in your vision, even in the face of initial doubt or rejection.Despite the doubts and naysayers, Blackwell chose to pursue his belief in the band and their unique sound.This serves as a reminder for entrepreneurs and business leaders to trust our instincts and have the courage to go against the grain. The unconventional often holds tremendous untapped potential. Being bold and persistent unlocks hidden gems that can revolutionize your industry, discover remarkable talent and achieve extraordinary success.It‚Äôs important not to be swayed by initial discouragement, but rather to place trust in our own instincts and embrace the possibilities that others may overlook or never see. CEEK had the exclusive of recording this intimate interview that spans his illustrious career and life. #barefootmogul #onelovemovie #CEEK #Metaverse¬†¬†üëâ Watch full interview¬†https://lnkd.in/e93PmMBD
